name: Apocalypse Sword God
author: 七猫免费小说
content: If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!
